title: Analysis settings.
description: Specifies the model settings and outputs for an analysis.

output_summaries.title: Insured loss summary outputs
output_summaries.description: Specified which outputs should be generated for which summary sets, for insured losses.

oed_fields.title: OED fields
oed_fields.description: A list of OED fields used to group the generated losses.

summarycalc.title: Summary calculation flag
summarycalc.description: If true, output summary calculations by level for the summary set.

eltcalc.title: ELT calculation flag
eltcalc.description: If true, output the event loss table by level  for the summary set.

aalcalc.title: AAL calculation flag
aalcalc.description: If true, output the average annual loss by level for the summary set.

pltcalc.title: PLT calculation flag
pltcalc.description: If true, output the period loss table by level for the summary set.

lec_output.title: LEC calculation flag
lec_output.description: If true, output loss exceed curves by level for the summary set.

leccalc.title: LEC calculation settings
leccalc.description: Specifies which loss exceedence curve types will be outputed for the summary level

return_period_file.title: Return period file flag
return_period_file.description: If true, a file listing the return periods will be provided as part of the analysis inputs. If false, a default set will be used.

full_uncertainty_aep.title: Full uncertainty AEP flag
full_uncertainty_aep.description: If true and LEC output is true, output the full uncertainty aggregate loss exceedence curve by level for the summary set.

full_uncertainty_oep.title: Full uncertainty OEP flag
full_uncertainty_oep.description: If true and LEC output is true, output the full uncertainty occurrence loss exceedence curve by level for the summary set.

wheatsheaf_aep.title: Wheatsheaf AEP flag
wheatsheaf_aep.description: If true and LEC output is true, output the wheatsheaf aggregate loss exceedence curve by level for the summary set.

wheatsheaf_oep.title: Wheatsheaf OEP flag
wheatsheaf_oep.description: If true and LEC output is true, output the wheatsheaf occurrence loss exceedence curve by level for the summary set.

wheatsheaf_mean_aep.title: Wheatsheaf mean AEP flag
wheatsheaf_mean_aep.description: If true and LEC output is true, output the wheatsheaf mean aggregate loss exceedence curve by level for the summary set.

wheatsheaf_mean_oep.title: Wheatsheaf mean OEP schema.
wheatsheaf_mean_oep.description: If true and LEC output is true, output the wheatsheaf occurrence loss exceedence curve by level for the summary set.

sample_mean_aep.title: Sample mean AEP flag
sample_mean_aep.description: If true and LEC output is true, output the sample mean aggregate loss exceedence curve by level for the summary set.

sample_mean_oep.title: Sample mean OEP schema.
sample_mean_oep.description: If true and LEC output is true, output the sample occurrence loss exceedence curve by level for the summary set.

elt_sample.title: SELT
elt_sample.description: Sample Event Loss Table (ORD Output flag)

elt_quantile.title: QELT
elt_quantile.description: Quantile Event Loss Table (ORD Output flag)

elt_moment.title: MELT
elt_moment.description: Moment Event Loss Table (ORD Output flag)

plt_sample.title: SPLT
plt_sample.description: Sample Period Loss Table (ORD Output flag)

plt_quantile.title: QPLT
plt_quantile.description: Quantile Period Loss Table (ORD Output flag)

plt_moment.title: MPLT
plt_moment.description: Moment Period Loss Table (ORD Output flag)

alt_period.title: PALT
alt_period.description: Period Average Loss Table (ORD Output flag)

ept_full_uncertainty_aep.title: EPT - Full Uncertainty AEP
ept_full_uncertainty_aep.description: Exceedance Probability Table (option), when enable this metric is added to the EPT file

ept_full_uncertainty_oep.title: EPT - Full Uncertainty OEP
ept_full_uncertainty_oep.description: Exceedance Probability Table (option), when enable this metric is added to the EPT file

ept_mean_sample_aep.title: EPT - Mean Sample AEP
ept_mean_sample_aep.description: Exceedance Probability Table (option), when enable this metric is added to the EPT file

ept_mean_sample_oep.title: EPT - Mean Sample OEP
ept_mean_sample_oep.description: Exceedance Probability Table (option), when enable this metric is added to the EPT file

ept_per_sample_mean_aep.title: EPT - Per Sample Mean AEP
ept_per_sample_mean_aep.description: Exceedance Probability Table (option), when enable this metric is added to the EPT file

ept_per_sample_mean_oep.title: EPT - Per Sample Mean OEP
ept_per_sample_mean_oep.description: Exceedance Probability Table (option), when enable this metric is added to the EPT file

psept_aep.title: PSEPT - Aggregate Loss
psept_aep.description: Per Sample Exceedance Probability Table, (option) when enable this metric is added to the PSEPT file

psept_oep.title: PSEPT - Occurrence Loss
psept_oep.description: Per Sample Exceedance Probability Table (option), when enable this metric is added to the PSEPT file

return_period_file.title: ORD Return period file flag
return_period_file.description: If true, a file listing the return periods will be used for EPT and PSEPT files. If false, a default set will be used.

source_tag.title: Source Tag
source_tag.description: Labels the origin of the analysis.

analysis_tag.title: Analysis Tag
analysis_tag.description: Labels the analysis with an identifier.

model_supplier_id.title: Model supplier ID
model_supplier_id.description: Identifier for the model vendor/module supplier.

number_of_samples.title: Number of samples.
number_of_samples.description: The number of samples generated per event.

gul_threshold.title: Ground-up loss threshold
gul_threshold.description: The threshold at which groun-up losses will be capped.

return_periods.title: User set return periods
return_periods.description: List of return periods as integers '[10, 100, 1000 .. etc]'

event_ids.title: User set event ids
event_ids.description: List of event ids as integers '[1, 5, 123 .. etc]'

quantiles.title: User set quantile points
quantiles.description: List of quantiles as float values '[0.0, 0.2, 0.4 .. etc]'

use_random_number_file.title: Use random number file
use_random_number_file.description: If true use a pre-generated set of random number, if false generate random numbers dynamically.

event_set.title: Event set file ID.
event_set.description: Identifier for the event set file that is used for output calculations.

event_occurrence_id.title: Event occurrence file ID.
event_occurrence_id.description: Identifier for the event occurrence file that is used for output calculations.

gul_output.title: Produce GUL output
gul_output.description: If true generate ground-up loss outputs as per specified gul-summaries.

gul_summaries.title: Ground-up loss summary outputs
gul_summaries.description: Specified which outputs should be generated for which summary sets, for ground-up losses.

il_output.title: Produce il output
il_output.description: If true generate insured loss outputs as per specified il-summaries.

il_summaries.title: Insured loss summary outputs
il_summaries.description: Specified which outputs should be generated for which summary sets, for insured losses.

ri_output.title: Produce ri output
ri_output.description: If true generate reinsurance net loss outputs as per specified ri-summaries.

ri_summaries.title: Reinsurance net loss summary outputs
ri_summaries.description: Specified which outputs should be generated for which summary sets, for reinsurance net losses.

full_correlation.title: Produce fully correlated output
full_correlation.description: If true generate losses for fully correlated output, i.e. no independence between groups, in addition to losses for default output.
